title: INTEGRAL (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK INTEGRAL
determines approximately the integral over time.
Example: Function block in FBD

rows: Time since last call in msec

rows.Name: OUT
rows.Comment:
Value of the integral. This is done by summing all part
integralsIN*TM

rows:
TRUE: The value ofOUTis out of range of REAL variables. he function is blocked till
it is new initialised by inputRESET.
